name: Gnome Subtitles
description: Gnome Subtitles is a subtitle editor. It supports most common text subtitles, subtitle editing, translation and synchronization, video preview and other operations.

en_US.description: Gnome Subtitles is a subtitle editor. It supports most common text subtitles, subtitle editing, translation and synchronization, video preview and other operations.
en_US.name: Gnome Subtitles

zh_CN.description: Gnome Subtitles是一个字幕编辑器，它支持大多数常见的文本格式字幕并且支持字幕编辑，翻译和同步、视频预览等功能操作。
zh_CN.name: Gnome Subtitles
